name: Horror House (Bd3n)
description:
Trapped in a horrifying house you need to make your way out alive. However the rooms around you seem to be moving making escape seem impossible. Enemies seem to appear in the darkness so keep your flashlight batteries charged. Avoid monsters from taking your soul. Use your holy water gun to purify enemies, as long as you don't run out of water. There are three different ways to escape the house, can you find them all?

Controls:
  Move: WASD
  Aim: Mouse
  Shoot: Click
  Flashlight: F

This game lies in the fact that everything you believe is subject to change.

We owe a lot of credit to the artist behind a lot of our sprites. Thank you all.
